scripts.gradlew: cd android && gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native run-android
scripts.debug: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && yarn run post-debug
scripts.release: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.releaseWin: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && del android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && del android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
